::Kluster::

Kluster looks at one of the screens in the Cybertronian Fire's 
bridge, noticing Klant near the ship. He stands up and walks to the 
exit of the ship, stopping at the hatch. The base was still on red 
alert, so he closed a door behind him before opening the hatch.

"Hello," he says to the bot outside, "I'm Kluster, commander of this 
ship. You want to join the Maximals?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> It was against his nature to show his anger, but he really was 
getting mad.
> 
> "Hello! is there anyone in there by chance?" Klant calls out to the 
Cybertronian Fire again. (Please, somebody just clear him to come in, 
he's a good warrior!)
